summary: Retextures for the god shrines. better than the tacky purple default which looked plastic.
descriptionHtml:
Golden God Shrines

i just thought i would make a simple mod for myself as the colours of the default god shrines were just awful and looked like plastic, so i created this mod to tackle that issue and retextured the shrines so they now are made from gold or silver. i decided i would put it up also as some of you guys may also find the colour scheme horrible. Hope you guys like it.

IF you dont want to have gold or silver stands for the shrines do this....
Delete \"julianos.DDS\" from the shrines textures folder that will just make the shrines gold.


p.s the talos god shrine has also been done but isnt included in the pictures.

-Joplay2999
author: joplay299
